{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Securifi |model=Almond |revision=AL3 |asin=B01ENURKS2 |price=150 |fcc_date=10/06/2016 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=now |type=wireless router, smart home hub, IoT hub, mesh node, |fcc_id=AHLAL3 |ic_id=10114A-AL3 |pcb_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7621AT |cpu1_cspeed=880 |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=32 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=W25Q256FVFG |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W632GG6KB-12 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag=yes,, 5-pin header,, J501 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, J2 |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7602E |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi2_chip1_model=MT7612E |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=2 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=ZigBee Chip;SiLabs;EM357;;1; |flags=ZigBee, Z-Wave, touchscreen, |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|802.11ac Wi-Fi Touchscreen Router + Smart Home Hub}} :[https://www.securifi.com/almond3 Product page]
===Technical Specifications=== *Wireless: 802.11abgn/ac (AC1200), Mesh Networking *Ports: 1x WAN GbE, 2x LAN GbE, 1x USB 2.0 *Home Automation: ZigBee (HA 1.2), Z-Wave with USB dongle *Power Supply: 12V/1.5A DC (Input: 110~220V, 50/60Hz)
====Multi-Purpose==== :Router / Access Point / Range Extender / Wireless Bridge *Router or AP - works with any Internet modem from any provider *Range Extender - wirelessly extend your existing Wi-Fi network *Wireless Bridge - connect your wired only devices to a Wi-Fi network
===Reviews=== *[http://www.anandtech.com/show/9978/securifi-updates-smart-home-hub-lineup-with-new-almond-3-wireless-router ''New Almond 3 Wireless Router'' on '''AnandTech''']
